function.name: createRawNarrative
function.description: Creates a narrative for a wedding video based on given themes and durations.

name.description: The title of the wedding narrative.

theme.description: Descriptive keywords for the narrative's style, e.g., 'Fun, High Energy, and Exciting'.

totalTargetDuration.description: The total duration of the wedding video in milliseconds.

rawNarrative.description: List of video segments e.g., ['Title Sequence', 'Interview', 'Montage'].

bpm.description: Beats per minute, if applicable, for setting the pace of the video.
